title: banning for 20mins x 5times
body: okay i was playing a solo ranked and the game was about 40 mins and i have played since my internet went down for 5 mins that case it made my account banning 20mins for 5times and it wasnt on purpose and im really sad about banning account.{{champion:24}}

replies.body:
It's not a ban. What you're describing is the low priority queue penalty hand to you by the Leaverbuster. It detects you as "away" if you haven't sent a command to your champion in a game for five consecutive minutes.

Your punishment won't be lifted, and only playing more games (without leaving them, of course) will remove it. What you can also do is ensure that your internet won't cut out again while playing, either by asking here or getting help in some other way.
